text:
Hey Devs! You will like this one :eyes:

Our new app, _*Hooked*_, with _*advanced webhook functionality*_ is now live!

You can send any payload, to anywhere, using POST, GET, PATCH, PUT, or DELETE :boom:

<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/ecosystem/marketplace/apps/_detail/hooked-powered-by-unmatched-1966606>
